newsitem.title: USA: Hawaiian Airlines sets stock plan deadline.
newsitem.headline: Hawaiian Airlines sets stock plan deadline.

text.p: Hawaiian Airlines Inc said Tuesday that it has set a deadline of September 12 for its shareholder and employee rights offering.
Company employees and shareholders have been offered rights to purchase 9.25 million shares.

In conjunction with the offering a group of investors have agreed to buy 2.25 million shares at $3.25 a share, plus the additional shares needed to bring proceeds from the employee/shareholder offering up to $25 million.
Shares of Hawaiian were 1/16 lower at 3-5/16 in later trading on the American Stock Exchange.
